meta.slate_description: Sunday main slate games from user list
meta.note: All players checked against latest depth charts, injury reports, and preview/fantasy articles as of 2025-11-29.

qbs.name: Matthew Stafford
qbs.matchup_note: Panthers secondary banged up; Rams passing game leading league in efficiency.
qbs.fact_check_notes: Confirmed Rams starting QB with 30 passing TDs and top-5 passing yards through Week 12; no injury designation for Week 13 at Panthers.

qbs.name: Josh Allen
qbs.matchup_note: Steelers defense allowing plenty of yards; Bills expected to lean on Allen as dual-threat.
qbs.fact_check_notes: Confirmed starting QB on Bills depth chart; injury concerns are on offensive tackles, not Allen.

qbs.name: Tua Tagovailoa
qbs.matchup_note: Home favorite with explosive weapons; Saints defense middle of the pack.
qbs.fact_check_notes: No current injury designation; multiple previews discuss Miami offense vs Saints with Tua under center.

qbs.name: Justin Herbert
qbs.matchup_note: Big home favorite vs Raiders; game total middling but Chargers implied total solid.
qbs.fact_check_notes: Still listed as Chargers starting QB with no Week 13 injury downgrade.

qbs.name: Bo Nix
qbs.matchup_note: Rookie QB leading 9-2 Broncos into SNF vs injury-depleted Commanders.
qbs.fact_check_notes: Week 13 previews describe Nix leading Denver into Sunday night matchup vs Washington; no injury concerns noted.

rbs.name: Christian McCaffrey
rbs.matchup_note: Bad weather, tough defense, but offense still built around him.
rbs.fact_check_notes: 49ers report describes his missed practices as needed rest; Browns previews focus on how to contain him, not on injury concerns.

rbs.name: De'Von Achane
rbs.matchup_note: Explosive back in great form vs middling run defense; spotlight of many fantasy articles.
rbs.fact_check_notes: Week 13 outlook pieces highlight Achane as a smash play vs Saints; not on current injury report.

rbs.name: Kyren Williams
rbs.matchup_note: Workhorse back on high-scoring Rams vs average run defense.
rbs.fact_check_notes: Week 13 previews show ~796 rushing yards and 9 total TDs; no injury designation vs Panthers.

rbs.name: Travis Etienne Jr.
rbs.matchup_note: Favored game script vs 1–10 Titans; analysts call for run-heavy plan.
rbs.fact_check_notes: Fantasy and team reports say he is off the injury report and projected for a strong workload in Week 13.

rbs.name: James Cook
rbs.matchup_note: Primary Bills back; often mentioned as key complement to Allen vs Steelers.
rbs.fact_check_notes: Bills depth charts and matchup previews emphasize Allen–Cook combo; no injury designation for Cook.

wrs.name: Puka Nacua
wrs.matchup_note: Rams' yardage leader with ~947 receiving yards; facing depleted Panthers secondary.
wrs.fact_check_notes: Team and league stats pages list 80 catches for 947 yards this season, active for Week 13.

wrs.name: Davante Adams
wrs.matchup_note: Red-zone monster with league-leading TD total, part of Rams' elite passing attack.
wrs.fact_check_notes: Confirmed on Rams roster with 12 receiving TDs in 11 games; multiple previews highlight the Nacua–Adams duo vs Carolina.

wrs.name: Jaylen Waddle
wrs.matchup_note: Secondary option behind Achane/Waller but still explosive; indoor-style environment.
wrs.fact_check_notes: Listed as active Dolphins WR; no Week 13 injury downgrade in reports.

wrs.name: Khalil Shakir
wrs.matchup_note: Starting WR for Bills; extra work possible if Kincaid is limited.
wrs.fact_check_notes: Bills depth chart shows Shakir as a starting WR; fantasy rankings note his role could grow if Kincaid's hamstring limits him.

wrs.name: Jaxon Smith-Njigba
wrs.matchup_note: League leader in receiving yards; home favorite vs low-implied-total Vikings.
wrs.fact_check_notes: SEA/MIN injury reports list him as rest only with full participation; no game-status designation.

tes.name: Trey McBride
tes.matchup_note: Offense runs heavily through him; consensus TE1 in many Week 13 rankings.
tes.fact_check_notes: Fantasy articles rank McBride as No.1 TE for Week 13 and highlight favorable volume vs Buccaneers.

tes.name: Darren Waller
tes.matchup_note: Fresh off IR with strong red-zone role; slight concern due to recent pec injury.
tes.fact_check_notes: Dolphins officially activated him from IR on Nov 29; expected to be available.

tes.name: George Kittle
tes.matchup_note: Tough low-total game but still a primary red-zone option.
tes.fact_check_notes: No Week 13 injury designation; projected as a strong TE despite weather.

tes.name: Kyle Pitts
tes.matchup_note: Falcons likely to funnel more TE targets with Drake London ruled out.
tes.fact_check_notes: Pitts is not on ATL's injury report; London ruled out.

tes.name: Brenton Strange
tes.matchup_note: Came off IR and led Jags in receiving last week; emerging TE1.
tes.fact_check_notes: Returned from IR in Week 12 with a 5-for-93 line; projected starting TE.
